Fever Fetish

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 359
generates fire gems [gf]: 2F per month
(diseases-bearer [disease])

Requires 5F5N to forge (F1N1)

This fetish will disease its bearer and use the heat of his fever to produce magical Fire gems. It usually takes a few months for the fever to become intense enough to produce the magic gems, but putting the amulet on a wounded soldier can speed up the process.
